Reviews.Title: “Good location but another hotel in the area would be a much better choice.”
Reviews.Author: trock001
Reviews.Content: promised ground level assigned 3rd floor lift available stairs steep narrow telephone drawer connections shower pressure nonexistent mattress terrible manager refused description hotel wifi signal clerk suggested pirate signal door hotel manager technician wifi period 6 days signal nor indication technician coffee tea hot water pot similar priced hotels paddington suggest choice hotel recently painted flat screen tv signal ethnic restaurants reasonably priced london easy heathrow airport hotel via paddington station

Reviews.Title: “Unpleasant stay only thing good is the location.”

Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights theres lift hotel thankful groundfloor fair bit luggage cramped 2 double beds luggage parked whatever space hardly walking space 4 3 cups saucers tea tea coffee replenished day toilet burly person squeeze doorway sideways english breakfast mediocre staff unpleasant smiles greetings especially asian lady sulky aloof definitely hospitality service industry plus location near paddington station easily tube london
